name: Mark Cooper
text:
Been comming here since they opened
My daughter makes all her friends go here at. Least one time
I have a gallon and a 64 oz cup ‚Ä¶More

name: Zach
text: We love the Buffalo Chicken Pizza, but it really is overpriced.  If the pizza was about $5 less, it would be more reasonable.  Also, their onions on the pizza are almost completely raw and seem like they were just picked from the garden.  Lower your prices a bit and cook your veggies first.

name: Kayla Schneider
text:
I love their pizza! We've ordered twice from them. I am not a sauce girl. But their sauce is great! I do ask for it light because again I don't like a lot of sauce on my pizza just enough to give me flavor
But the pizza has been wonderful both times!

name: Steve Randall
text: A very good pizza. Restaurant is basicly just a place to eat your pizza. No fountain drinks or beer.

name: Nancy Hilke
text: The steak sandwich was delicious üëå I also had a slice or the Chicken ranch pizza!! Go there you have to try this!!!‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

name: Zach Dolan
text: I find this pizza to be overpriced and too soft. It's not thin enough for folding, but not thick enough to hold its own weight and the crust somewhat oddly reminds me of a croissant. The ovens need to be a bit hotter, as every time I've had this pizza it seems underdone and could benefit from some crispiness.

name: Amy Billings
text: Excellent pizza and my  Hoagie was tasty.

name: Jamie M
text:
Pizza was excellent salad was good and they deliver
Will order from them again

name: Larry Wurth
text: First of all, I really enjoy the pizza hear.  I was really looking forward to getting my usual tonight.  I knew they closed at 9 PM, I was there at 8:40 PM.  When I arrived, the open sign was lit, but the door was locked.  I looked inside ‚Ä¶More

name: Frank J Samuels
text: Fox's catered a birthday party I attended. The pizza was so good I decided to visit and try them a few months later. Excellent pizza. This is a nice clean, friendly place with a huge Italian menu. I love a place that gets their pizza right. Amen.

name: me
text: Sorry, wasn't impressed. You can get better for cheaper. Plus, the veggies were basically raw except for the CANNED mushrooms.

name: gypsy Europe
text: Good pizza, very friendly and modestly prices

name: Cloud Tyler Ruth
text: Great pizza!  Toppings are fresh and the cheese is melty! I would highly recommend this place over any of the big pizza chains out there.  Best dough around.  Also very speedy service.  5/5 worth.

name: Steven Mann
text: I came from Alabama on my way to Helena, Montana and I was very pleasantly surprised with this place when stopping in O‚ÄôFallon.  Very delicious, pizza! If for some reason you are coming out of town and passing through here for any reason, I strongly recommend this place.

name: Rod S
text: Outstanding pizza!  Great Crust, good sauce and toppings.  My go to pizza place in O'fallon.  Have had their sandwiches, salads, and appetizers and all have been very good.  Reasonably priced and consider a good value. ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Harton
text: Whenever I have to go to the city I always have to stop for the steak sandwich.  Great family serving fantastic food.

name: Mary Milburn
text: I would recommend Fox's pizza every time.  The crust is fresh and the cheese is much higher quality than you'll find at other chains.  I highly recommend their gourmet specialty combinations, and the strombolis.

name: Dan Gruender
text: Great pizza and calzones.

name: Shawn Black
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time!!!

name: Robert Lewis
text: Great pizza by a family owned local establishment. Highly recommend.

name: Greg Rupp
text: Great pizza.  Been family owned for many years but learned that it is a franchise of a Pennsylvania chain.  Family members very nice and helpful. Small dining area but can deliver and pick up.

name: Jody Miles
text: The staff and management are tops! I enjoyed a delicious fresh salad and toasted ravioli. I've had and enjoyed the pizza as well. I will be back.

name: Ryan E.
text: My family and I have gone to this place for years and have always gotten great pizza and strombolis here. It is seriously the most delicious pizza in the area, way better than Papa John's or other similar restaurants.

name: John Payeur
text: This pizza here was very very good. Good enough for me to rate it an i have never rated anything on google before. I will be back there again for sure !!  Ps the cinnamon sticks were fabulous. And for the workers/owners nothing but friendly smiles.

name: Mike Spicer
text: Pizza... very good.  $18 for a medium 3 topping,  good, no. Cause the medium is small at best. Well made and great taste, be ready to pay dearly for it.

name: Ryan Serandos
text: Great staff!! Great Selection!! Great Service!! Oh...and PHENOMINAL PIZZA!!

name: Clinton Eppler
text: Great pizza and friendly staff.

name: Jason Young
text: I am in town for work and happened across Fox's and was blown away! The steak rancher pizza was amazing! I'll definitely be back when I'm back this way!

name: Bryce Dillon
text: Their pizza was good I would go back there

name: S. Wallace
text: I's a nice place to get pizza

name: Brian Wyatt
text: Food was outstanding!!! Buffalo bites, Taco Pizza and even regular cheese pizza was delicious!! The service for dine in was very fast and friendly! We will be back many more times!!!

name: Vincent Anzelone
text: One of my favorite places from the Pittsburgh area right here in MO.  Great food and great people!

name: Sue Donze
text: We always enjoy our food. We try everything on the Menu from pizza to hoggies to the weggies. It's all very delicious. Great customer service too.

name: Katherine Rice
text: Do not even bother using a coupon as they charge you more than advertised. Pizza crust is bland and tasteless. Better off eatting a frozen pizza.

name: Maxx Flavin

text: I ordered a stromboli, I had it delivered to the hotel I was staying at. It can fast and hot! Excellent! Very flavorful!
